name: MTurk Worker Site Dark Blue Theme [BETA]
description:
A dark blue theme to counter the bright white of the worker side of MTurk. Viewable on https://worker.mturk.com/ and any sub-pages, not the old MTurk site. This theme is currently incomplete and is in BETA.

Current Version: 0.13-BETA

Other Notes - If you know what you're doing, feel free to make changes to the CSS as you wish. Please do this at your own discretion, as I won't be able to provide support for your own changes.
additional_info:
Known Issues:
- Arrows on Service Health page are images, will need to be replaced - Some scripts rely on the worker site's stylesheets (colors), so some of the dark theme's coloring may carry over. I've noticed this happened with Overwatch, so I added additional stylesheet information to exclude that from happening to that particular script.

Releases:
v. 0.1-BETA - Initial Release v 0.2-BETA - Fixed colors of table rows for unqualified HITs. They are a darker color to differentiate from qualified HITs v 0.3-BETA - Fixed theme so it will work on separate pages (MTurk had tweaked something here, causing the theme to nullify. v 0.4-BETA - Fixed an issue where the TO ratings from MTurk Suite were grabbing theme colors, making text hard to read. v 0.5-BETA - Themed the new Worker-side Earnings and Transfer page. v 0.6-BETA - Added new Worker Accounts page to inclusion list. v 0.7-BETA - Themed requesters' page (when you click on requester name) and the new Contact (Amazon-side) page. Modified qualification section so that it's easier to differentiate between multiple qualifications on a HIT. Fixed HIT Details text color. Added new Header, current-page-link, and divider (located between Hide Details and Items Per Page) colors so they can be easily modified. Updated link hover/mouseover colors so they match the theme's accent. Temporarily (?) overrode TurkerView's small export button, as well as TurkerView's pop-over detail panel (This was showing white text on a white background before). Other general color improvements. v 0.7.1-BETA - Fixed theme from not loading when logging into MTurk. v 0.8-BETA - Fixed qualification test page backgrounds. Qualification colors separated, easier to differentiate between the quals. Other general fixes. (Thanks to WimpLo on TH for the find!) v 0.9-BETA - Fixed qualification text areas from showing white text on a white background. v 0.13-BETA - Whitelisted the new MTurk payment pages so the theme is applied to these new pages as well. Also skipped a few version numbers so the version matches the dark grey theme, making versioning consistent across theme options.
